name: Smort
description:
In this game enemies (red) will come from different angles and try to get you. They somehow can see you wherever you go and aim at you. Utilize walls to kill enemies, you only have 3 lives however you cannot lose yet. Currently has 1 level. Use WASD keys to control.

To play, download the game, then go to Scratch or Turbowarp's editor and press file, then press "Load from your computer" and choose the file to play.

The Game is a work in progress, it's not finished so far.
